dcterms:description: A large-scale benchmark containing 299 15-minute videos, divided into 211k training clips and 57k validation clips, annotated at 1FPS for boxes and labels, covering 60 common action classes.
dcterms:title: AVA

dcterms:creator: Khurram Soomro
Amir Roshan Zamir
Mubarak Shah
dcterms:description: A dataset of 101 human action classes from videos in the wild, containing 3,207 videos from 24 sports classes, each video containing a single action class.
dcterms:title: UCF101-24

dcterms:creator: Hueihan Jhuang
Juergen Gall
Silvia Zuffi
Cordelia Schmid
Michael J Black
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 928 trimmed videos from 21 action classes, designed to facilitate understanding of action recognition.
dcterms:title: JHMDB
